title: Opinion: Rafi Songs To Roti, Bruneis Deep Cultural Connect With India
content: While it's heartening to see the influence of Indian culture in Brunei even before Prime Minister Modis visit, India must further engage with this small yet affluent nation to enhance its strategic position in the region.
summary: While it's heartening to see the influence of Indian culture in Brunei even before Prime Minister Modis visit, India must further engage with this small yet affluent nation to enhance its strategic position in the region.

title: PM Modi In Singapore To Enhance Strategic Ties. Know All About His Visit
content: PM Modi has arrived in Singapore for his official two-day visit to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations. The prime minister's visit to Singapore comes after a historic visit to Brunei as part of New Delhi's 'Act East' policy.
summary: PM Modi has arrived in Singapore for his official two-day visit to further strengthen bilateral ties between the two nations. The prime minister's visit to Singapore comes after a historic visit to Brunei as part of New Delhi's 'Act East' policy.

title: Screen Time In Bed Is Worse Than Screen Time Before Bed: Study
content: Parents of children and teenagers have long been warned about the dangers of screen time and digital devices before bed the worry being that screens could harm the sleep patterns of young people.
summary: Parents of children and teenagers have long been warned about the dangers of screen time and digital devices before bed the worry being that screens could harm the sleep patterns of young people.

title: Campaign Launched To Increase Participation Of Indian-Americans In US Polls
content: Ahead of the November 5 US presidential elections, an Indian diaspora group has launched a campaign to increase the policy impact and participation of Indian-American voters in the polls.
summary: Ahead of the November 5 US presidential elections, an Indian diaspora group has launched a campaign to increase the policy impact and participation of Indian-American voters in the polls.

title: How Luck Often Trumps Justice In US Immigration System
content: The US asylum process is meant to offer a fair shot at safe haven. But new reporting from Bloomberg uncovers how the difference between those who are granted asylum and those who are denied often boils down to chance.
summary: The US asylum process is meant to offer a fair shot at safe haven. But new reporting from Bloomberg uncovers how the difference between those who are granted asylum and those who are denied often boils down to chance.

title: NASA Images Show Construction Of Egypt's Brand-New Capital City
content: The city dubbed as The New Administrative Capital (NAC) will be a sprawling metropolis, comparable in size to Singapore, and designed to accommodate over 6 million residents.
summary: The city dubbed as The New Administrative Capital (NAC) will be a sprawling metropolis, comparable in size to Singapore, and designed to accommodate over 6 million residents.

title: 'Beware Of Handsome Men, Beautiful Women': China's Spy Warning to Students
content: China's state security agency on Wednesday warned students with access to sensitive information against falling for "handsome men" or "beautiful women" that might entice them to spy for foreign powers.
summary: China's state security agency on Wednesday warned students with access to sensitive information against falling for "handsome men" or "beautiful women" that might entice them to spy for foreign powers.

title: US Man, 70, Died After Doctor Removed Wrong Organ During Surgery: Lawsuit
content: A 70-year-old man in the United States died on an operating table after the doctor mistakenly removed the wrong organ during surgery.
summary: A 70-year-old man in the United States died on an operating table after the doctor mistakenly removed the wrong organ during surgery.

title: X Investors Have Lost $24 Billion Since Elon Musk Takeover In 2022: Report
content: When Elon Musk acquired X (then Twitter) in 2022 for $44 billion, he did so with the backing of a formidable group of investors, including Saudi Prince Alwaleed bin Talal, Twitter co-founder Jack Dorsey and leading Silicon Valley venture capital firm

title: Who Were The 4 Indians Killed In The US Car Crash?
content: Four Indians were charred to death in a massive car crash in Texas, US, on Friday. The victims, who were carpooling to Arkansas, were identified as Aryan Raghunath Orampati, Farooq Shaik, Lokesh Palacharla and Dharshini Vasudevan.
summary: Four Indians were charred to death in a massive car crash in Texas, US, on Friday. The victims, who were carpooling to Arkansas, were identified as Aryan Raghunath Orampati, Farooq Shaik, Lokesh Palacharla and Dharshini Vasudevan.

title: Nvidia Gets DOJ Subpoena In Escalating Antitrust Probe
content: The DOJ, which had previously delivered questionnaires to companies, is now sending legally binding requests that oblige recipients to provide information

title: 7,000 And Counting: A Look At Sultan Of Brunei's $5 Billion Car Collection
content: Sultan Of Brunei's car collection boasts more than 7,000 vehicles and is worth an estimated $5 billion.

title: US Lenders Won't Have A Say On Who Runs Byju's Amid Bankruptcy Concerns
content: US lenders to Byju's were removed from an influential creditors committee by a court-appointed arbitrator in India, a potential boon for the struggling online-education company seeking to avert bankruptcy.
summary: US lenders to Byju's were removed from an influential creditors committee by a court-appointed arbitrator in India, a potential boon for the struggling online-education company seeking to avert bankruptcy.

title: Man Who Designed Nigeria's Flag To Get Burial A Year After Death
content: A year after the man who designed the Nigerian flag died at 87, his family has decided to bury his body. The family had been waiting for the government to fulfill its promise to arranging a state burial for him, but the promise never materialised.
summary: A year after the man who designed the Nigerian flag died at 87, his family has decided to bury his body. The family had been waiting for the government to fulfill its promise to arranging a state burial for him, but the promise never materialised.

title: Kim Jong Un Executes 30 Officials For Failing To Prevent Floods: Report
content: In July, severe rainfall triggered landslides and flooding in North Korea, affecting over 4,000 homes and leaving 15,000 residents displaced.
summary: In July, severe rainfall triggered landslides and flooding in North Korea, affecting over 4,000 homes and leaving 15,000 residents displaced.

title: Head of Mossad's Financial Network Arrested In Turkey
content: Turkish authorities have arrested Liridon Rexhepi, the head of Israel's Mossad intelligence agency's financial network in Turkey, according to a report by state media.
summary: Turkish authorities have arrested Liridon Rexhepi, the head of Israel's Mossad intelligence agency's financial network in Turkey, according to a report by state media.

title: Russia To Revise Nuclear Doctrine Over Actions Of The "Collective West"
content: Russia says it has become necessary for Moscow to revise its nuclear doctrine because of Washington's escalation of the war in Ukraine. The Kremlin has blamed the "collective actions of the West" for such a move, spokesperson Dmitry Peskov has said.
summary: Russia says it has become necessary for Moscow to revise its nuclear doctrine because of Washington's escalation of the war in Ukraine. The Kremlin has blamed the "collective actions of the West" for such a move, spokesperson Dmitry Peskov has said.

title: Young Chinese Women Hire Female Cosplayers To Play Dream Men
content: During her final years of high school, Chinese teenager Xu Yunting found an unusual way to make some pocket money -- transforming herself into male video game characters and taking their female devotees on dates.

title: Putin Orders Russian Scientists To Develop 'Anti-Aging' Cure: Report
